item.title: Infrared vs Oil Heater: 21 Pros and Cons
item.description:
There are clear differences between an infrared vs oil heater. But they are actually very simple to understand. In this article, I’m going to show you 21 pros and cons of using an infrared vs oil heater, so you know which one suits you best.

The difference between infrared heaters and oil heaters is that infrared heaters are designed for quick, directional heat and better efficiency, whereas oil heaters are meant to replace your home heating unit by heating whole rooms evenly and with more strength.

item.title: 3 Best Oil Heaters You Can Leave on All Night
item.description:
Oil heaters are exactly the type of heater you need to leave on all night and heat your basement safely.

These days, nights are freezing cold and you absolutely need to stay warm at night in order to get a good night of sleep.

For heating a bedroom, oil-heaters are really practical: Compared to other space heaters, they are very safe. And they are energy efficient and won’t raise your electric bill too high.
